summary: I finished my Secondary Education at Mindanao State University Naawan. This was the first time I started using computer by playing computer games like Counter Strike and Dota I.

schoolName: Asian College of Science and Technology
summary: I finished my 2 years Vocational Course Electronics and Componter Technology. This was the first time I started loving computer programming and computer troubleshooting. I was awarded as Best Technician of the year.
I finished my Bachelors of Science in Information Technology. I continue studying computer programming to pursue my passion in software development. I was awarded as Best Capstone of the year.
